name: Aruba Security Response Template
description: Standardized template for Aruba security event processing workflows

nodes.name: Validate Security Event
nodes.notes: Comprehensive security event validation with threat scoring

nodes.name: Route by Threat Level
nodes.notes: Route based on calculated threat score

nodes.name: Critical Threat Handler
nodes.notes: Handle critical threats with immediate isolation

nodes.name: High Threat Handler
nodes.notes: Handle high threats with enhanced monitoring

nodes.name: Medium Threat Handler
nodes.notes: Handle medium threats with analysis and logging

nodes.name: Execute Device Isolation
nodes.notes: Execute device isolation via Aruba API

nodes.name: Send Security Response
nodes.notes: Final security response to webhook caller

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'error', error_id: $json.error_id, message: 'Security event processing failed', event_id: $json.event_id, processing_id: $json.processing_id, template: $json.template }, null, 2) }}
